results.label: Crowdrise
results.description: Crowdrise is a website that uses crowdsourcing for charitable purposes. Crowdrise was founded by Edward Norton, Shauna Robertson, and the founders of Moosejaw, Robert and Jeffrey Wolfe. Crowdrise has been recognized by numerous media companies. Crowdrise is supported by Seth Rogen, Jonah Hill, Will Ferrell and other celebrities that want to tap into the power of their own social networks to create viral fundraising campaigns for their favorite charities.
